title: Pair of Leg Wraps
description: long black wraps with 1 3/4\" red and green embroidery extending to within 16\" of end on a) and to within 14\" of end on b); bottom edge selvedge; striped tape tie with black and white geometric center on both
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
